## ğŸš€ Getting Started

### 1ï¸âƒ£ Clone the repo

```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/linkdrop.git
cd linkdrop
```

### 2ï¸âƒ£ Install dependencies

```bash
pip install flask
```

### 3ï¸âƒ£ Set up the database

Create the SQLite table:

```sql
CREATE TABLE links (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    url TEXT NOT NULL,
    note TEXT,
    created_at TEXT
);
```

### 4ï¸âƒ£ Run the app

```bash
python app.py
```

Then open:

```
http://127.0.0.1:5000/
```
